metadata.name: Root_User_Password_Change_or_Recovery_observed
metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detects a root user who change password or recovery his password

ruleText:
rule AWS_Root_User_Password_Change_or_Recovery_observed
{

  meta:
    name = "Root_User_Password_Change_or_Recovery_observed"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detects a root user who change password or recovery his password"
    severity = "Medium"
    mitrre_ttp = ""
    mitre_mitigation = ""

  events:
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "AMAZON"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "AWS CloudTrail"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "admin" nocase or $e.metadata.product_name = "Admin" nocase
    or $e.metadata.product_name = "root" nocase or $e.metadata.product_name = "Root" nocase
    $e.security_result.action = "ALLOW"


  condition:
    $e
}
